data.name: Havsala: Into the Soul Palace Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Get all the soundtracks used in Havsala at high quality in a single instance.
data.about_the_game: Get all the soundtracks used in Havsala at high quality in a single instance.
data.short_description: Get all the soundtracks used in Havsala at high quality in a single instance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
